name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Tackled several famous algorithms (Tower of Hanoi, The Knapsack Problem, Newton Raphson, and many search methods)
Learned the fundamentals of data structures, recursion, testing and debugging

name: Engineering Software As A Service
description: Learned several software development processes (Agile (XP), Spiral, Waterfall & Rational Unified Process)
Built a web application through Linux using Ruby on Rails, GitHub, and The Heroku Cloud Platform

name: Leaders of Learning
description: Studied how leadership works in different learning environments and practiced imagining the future of learning

name: HTML5
description: Learned all of the new features of HTML5 as well as making HTML5 apps

name: Introduction to Educational Technology
description: Learned the history of educational technology and analyzed how different technologies teach users new information

name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Learned the difference between PaaS, IaaS and SaaS, as well as when to use them
